description:
Easily convert a Bubble group element into a PNG image using this lightweight plugin. Exported images can be downloaded directly to the user's device or saved in the Bubble database for future use.

[b]Usage Features:[/b] 

- Export any group element to PNG format.
- Assign dynamic filenames for exported images.
- Save exported images directly to the Bubble database.
- Enable client-side storage of images.

[table][url=https://screenshot-group.bubbleapps.io/?utm_source=bubble_plugins_preview&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=screenshot_group][img=158x40]https://d999c2fb1571594aedf60232928d50bd.cdn.bubble.io/f1727687709910x685635861836726400/demopreview.png[/img][/url]  [url=https://bubble.io/page?version=live&id=screenshot-group&name=&tab=tabs-1][img=146x40]https://d999c2fb1571594aedf60232928d50bd.cdn.bubble.io/f1727687715981x964390795348476500/demoeditor.png[/img][/url][/table]


[url=https://zeroqode.com?utm_source=bubble_plugins&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=banner_need_help][img width=100% height=auto]https://d999c2fb1571594aedf60232928d50bd.cdn.bubble.io/f1729070567910x376360857064011140/banner-need-help-last.webp[/img][/url]

[size=5][b]Feedback[/b][/size] 

[img width=100% height=auto]https://d999c2fb1571594aedf60232928d50bd.cdn.bubble.io/f1734955273790x749284919259606300/ss.webp[/img]

[size=5][b]FAQ[/b][/size]

- [b]Can I export a group containing images?[/b] 
Yes, this plugin supports exporting groups containing images. However, SVG files and HTML SVG elements are not supported.

- [b]How do I save the exported image in the Bubble database?[/b]
Enable the "Save to Bubble Database" option in the pluginâ€™s settings to automatically save the image to your database.

- [b]Can I assign a custom file name to the exported PNG?[/b]  
Yes, you can specify a dynamic file name in the plugin's "File Name" field.

- [b]Does this plugin support responsive groups?[/b]
The plugin captures the exact size and layout of the group at the time of export. Ensure the group is rendered correctly for the best results.

- [b]What happens if my group contains unsupported elements?[/b]
The plugin will skip SVG files and HTML SVG elements while generating the PNG. Ensure your group uses supported formats for a seamless experience.

name: Screenshot the Group
plugin_instructions:
- expose the add HTML ID to elements (Settings => General => Enable "Option the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements"
- add the ID to the Group you want to export as the image. 
- drag the element "Element as PNG" to the editor. 
- use the workflow "Export Image"
